plot: After 2 years of completely isolation in mountains, Musashi comes back in order to live a normal life. However, after his duel against Kijiro Sasaki he has many enemies who want to kill him.
plot_en: After 2 years of completely isolation in mountains, Musashi comes back in order to live a normal life. However, after his duel against Kijiro Sasaki he has many enemies who want to kill him.
plot_es: After 2 years of completely isolation in mountains, Musashi comes back in order to live a normal life. However, after his duel against Kijiro Sasaki he has many enemies who want to kill him.
title: Sorekara no Musashi
